name: La Pest
description:
We are Indie Studio full of game developers enthusiast who loves making games, though we're still amateurs but we had high dream of creating game with 9/10 to 11/10 ratings

This was our first visual novel games telling a story about a priest point of view in medieval era before blackdeath plague or known as "La Pest", which mean the plague

We wish to give you the most realistic experience as you read word by word accompanied by the ambience we put into!

Credits
